genius.core.timeline

Class DiscreteTimeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.timeline.Timeline
      • genius.core.timeline.DiscreteTimeline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeLineInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class DiscreteTimeline
extends Timeline
    Implementation of the timeline in which time is divided in rounds. Time does not pass within a round. Note that requesting the total time is in this case undefined. See also getOwnRoundsLeft()
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscreteTimeline

        public DiscreteTimeline(int totalRounds)
        Parameters:
        the - total number of rounds allowed on this timeline. Creates a timeline with a deadline of totalRounds number of rounds. If 3, the play rounds are 1,2,3 and when we are on round 4 the deadline is reached. see also getTime()

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        public double getTime()
        Description copied from class: Timeline
        Gets the time, running from t = 0 (start) to t = 1 (deadline). The time is normalized, so agents need not be concerned with the actual internal clock.
        Specified by:
        getTime in interface TimeLineInfo
        Specified by:
        getTime in class Timeline
        Returns:
        the time, running from t = 0 (start) to t = 1 (deadline). The time is normalized, so agents need not be concerned with the actual internal clock.

      • getType

        public Timeline.Type getType()
        Description copied from interface: TimeLineInfo
        In a time-based protocol, time passes within a round. In contrast, in a rounds-based protocol time only passes when the action is presented.
        Specified by:
        getType in interface TimeLineInfo
        Overrides:
        getType in class Timeline
        Returns:
        type of time: Type.Time or Type.Rounds.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
